name: Falling Emoji
description:
Sweet Falling Emoji's always jumps down the mountain.
Touch to change jump way of Falling Emoji. Pick red small square and make your way with ease in Falling Emoji.

Falling Emoji features:
✓ This is a mountain made of bricks.
✓ And this is an endless mountain. Jump forever with Falling Emoji.
✓ There are various traps in the mountain.
✓ Control your Falling Emoji, Jump down the mountain quickly and safely.
✓ So, this is a Fast-paced, top-down jumping game & parkour game.
✓ Suitable for players who like agile and jumping games.
✓ Simple game, suitable for everyone.
✓ Touch left screen to jumping left.
✓ Touch right screen to jumping right.
✓ A game just takes a few minutes, you can play at any time.
✓ Jumping and enjoying the beautiful scenery along the way.
✓ Support both mobiles and tablets.
